languages.text: "Скоро. Очень скоро, Дитя". {n}Алчные искры чужих фантазий озаряют разум.{/n} "Ты еще не способ{mf|ен|на} объять великий замысел Ткача Судеб, но почувствуй этот вкус власти, торжества, истинной свободы, Дитя!"

"Soon. Very soon now, Child." {n}Ravenous sparks of foreign visions illuminate your mind.{/n} "You are not yet able to fathom the grand design of the Weaver of Destinies, but you may already relish this taste of power, of triumph, of true freedom, Child!"
languages.original_text: "Скоро. Очень скоро, Дитя". {n}Алчные искры чужих фантазий озаряют разум.{/n} "Ты еще не способ{mf|ен|на} объять великий замысел Ткача Судеб, но почувствуй этот вкус власти, торжества, истинной свободы, Дитя!"

"Soon. Very soon now, Child." {n}Ravenous sparks of foreign visions illuminate your mind.{/n} "You are not yet able to fathom the grand design of the Weaver of Destinies, but you may already relish this taste of power, of triumph, of true freedom, Child!"

languages.text: "Bald. Sehr bald schon, Kind." {n}Gefräßige Funken fremder Visionen erhellen deinen Geist.{/n} "Ihr seid nicht in der Lage, den großen Plan des Webers der Schicksale zu erfassen, aber vielleicht genießt Ihr bereits diesen Hauch von Macht, Triumph und wahrer Freiheit, Kind!"
languages.original_text: "Soon. Very soon now, Child." {n}Ravenous sparks of foreign visions illuminate your mind.{/n} "You are not yet able to fathom the grand design of the Weaver of Destinies, but you may already relish this taste of power, of triumph, of true freedom, Child!"

traits.locale_text: "Bald. Sehr bald schon, Kind." {n}Gefräßige Funken fremder Visionen erhellen deinen Geist.{/n} "Ihr seid nicht in der Lage, den großen Plan des Webers der Schicksale zu erfassen, aber vielleicht genießt Ihr bereits diesen Hauch von Macht, Triumph und wahrer Freiheit, Kind!"

languages.text: "Yakında. Çok yakında Çocuğum." {n}Yabancı görülerin çakan kıvılcımları, zihnini aydınlatıyor.{/n} "Kader Dokuyan'ın büyük tasarımını henüz kavrayamıyorsun ama şimdiden gücün, zaferin, gerçek özgürlüğün tadına varabilirsin Çocuğum!"
languages.original_text: "Soon. Very soon now, Child." {n}Ravenous sparks of foreign visions illuminate your mind.{/n} "You are not yet able to fathom the grand design of the Weaver of Destinies, but you may already relish this taste of power, of triumph, of true freedom, Child!"

traits.locale_text: "Yakında. Çok yakında Çocuğum." {n}Yabancı görülerin çakan kıvılcımları, zihnini aydınlatıyor.{/n} "Kader Dokuyan'ın büyük tasarımını henüz kavrayamıyorsun ama şimdiden gücün, zaferin, gerçek özgürlüğün tadına varabilirsin Çocuğum!"

languages.text: « Bientôt. Très bientôt, mon enfant. » {n}Des éclats de visions étrangères illuminent votre esprit.{/n} « Vous n'êtes pas encore capable de saisir le grand dessein du Tisseur de Destins, mais vous pouvez déjà vous délecter de cet avant-goût de puissance, de triomphe, de liberté véritable, mon enfant ! »
languages.original_text: "Soon. Very soon now, Child." {n}Ravenous sparks of foreign visions illuminate your mind.{/n} "You are not yet able to fathom the grand design of the Weaver of Destinies, but you may already relish this taste of power, of triumph, of true freedom, Child!"

traits.locale_text: « Bientôt. Très bientôt, mon enfant. » {n}Des éclats de visions étrangères illuminent votre esprit.{/n} « Vous n'êtes pas encore capable de saisir le grand dessein du Tisseur de Destins, mais vous pouvez déjà vous délecter de cet avant-goût de puissance, de triomphe, de liberté véritable, mon enfant ! »

languages.text: «Pronto. Muy pronto, {mf|hijo mío|hija mía}». {n}Extrañas visiones iluminan tu mente con violentos fogonazos.{/n} «Aún no estás {mf|preparado|preparada} para comprender los insondables designios del Tejedor de Destinos, ¡pero ya puedes deleitarte con esta promesa de poder, de triunfo, de verdadera libertad!».
languages.original_text: "Soon. Very soon now, Child." {n}Ravenous sparks of foreign visions illuminate your mind.{/n} "You are not yet able to fathom the grand design of the Weaver of Destinies, but you may already relish this taste of power, of triumph, of true freedom, Child!"

traits.locale_text: «Pronto. Muy pronto, {mf|hijo mío|hija mía}». {n}Extrañas visiones iluminan tu mente con violentos fogonazos.{/n} «Aún no estás {mf|preparado|preparada} para comprender los insondables designios del Tejedor de Destinos, ¡pero ya puedes deleitarte con esta promesa de poder, de triunfo, de verdadera libertad!».

languages.text: “已经快了。很快了，孩子。”{n}这只异界实体充满贪婪的愿景，仿佛烈焰般照亮了你的心灵。{/n}“尽管你仍无法理解命运编织者的伟大愿景，但或许，你已经品尝到了力量与胜利的味道，体会到了真正的自由，孩子！”
languages.original_text: "Soon. Very soon now, Child." {n}Ravenous sparks of foreign visions illuminate your mind.{/n} "You are not yet able to fathom the grand design of the Weaver of Destinies, but you may already relish this taste of power, of triumph, of true freedom, Child!"

traits.locale_text: “已经快了。很快了，孩子。”{n}这只异界实体充满贪婪的愿景，仿佛烈焰般照亮了你的心灵。{/n}“尽管你仍无法理解命运编织者的伟大愿景，但或许，你已经品尝到了力量与胜利的味道，体会到了真正的自由，孩子！”

languages.text: 「すぐだ。もうすぐだ、子よ」{n}異質な幻の渇望する閃光があなたの心を照らした。{/n}「まだ『運命の操り手』の壮大な計画を理解することはできないが、この力の味わい、勝利の歓び、真の自由をすでに楽しむことができるだろう、子よ！」
languages.original_text: "Soon. Very soon now, Child." {n}Ravenous sparks of foreign visions illuminate your mind.{/n} "You are not yet able to fathom the grand design of the Weaver of Destinies, but you may already relish this taste of power, of triumph, of true freedom, Child!"

traits.locale_text: 「すぐだ。もうすぐだ、子よ」{n}異質な幻の渇望する閃光があなたの心を照らした。{/n}「まだ『運命の操り手』の壮大な計画を理解することはできないが、この力の味わい、勝利の歓び、真の自由をすでに楽しむことができるだろう、子よ！」
